scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q dist 2>nul & cd android && gradlew.bat clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:all: rmdir /s /q dist 2>nul & cd android && gradlew.bat clean && rmdir /s /q android\app\build 2>nul && cd ..
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:android && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && cd android && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.android:build:debug: npm run android:sync && cd android && gradlew.bat bundleDebug
scripts.android:clean:build: npm run clean:all && npm run android:build
scripts.android:dev: npm run android:sync && cd android && gradlew.bat installDebug
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android
